titles.title: Fair Campaign Communications Act
Fair Campaign Communications Act
A bill to require the Federal Election Commission to conduct a study on the classification of political campaign emails as spam.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
Fair Campaign Communications Act
This bill directs the Federal Election Commission to study and report on the practices and procedures used by email providers to classify emails from political campaigns (e.g., classifying such emails as spam).
